conclusion: Violation of Article 2 of Protocol No. 4 - Freedom of movement-{general} (Article 2 para. 2 of Protocol No. 4 - Freedom to leave a country);Violation of Article 13 - Right to an effective remedy (Article 13 - Effective remedy)

issue: Section 76(6) of the Bulgarian Identity Papers Act 1998
